directions: Mix together sour cream, canned tomatoes, dry ranch dressing mix, black olives, and shredded cheese. Chill for 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, with liquid
1/2 (1 ounce) package dry ranch salad dressing mix
1 (6 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained
title: Cheesy Sour Cream and Salsa Dip
